A

addMistake() - Method in class com.nurikabe.model.Board
Increase mistake counter by 1.

B

Board - Class in com.nurikabe.model
The class contains puzzle board information and methods that modify or return said information.
Board() - Constructor for class com.nurikabe.model.Board
Constructor method, initialises board and numberOfMistakes variables.
buildLevel(int) - Method in class com.nurikabe.controller.Nurikabe
Updates the model and view of the game board according to the level number given by the GUI.

C

N

Nurikabe - Class in com.nurikabe.controller
The class contains the main method for the Nurikabe program, and other methods used to get and modify data in the Board class.

R

Reader - Class in com.nurikabe.controller
This class is used to read and return puzzle information from .txt files.

Constructor method.
readFile(String) - Method in class com.nurikabe.controller.Reader
Reads resource determined by filePath parameter.
resetBoard() - Method in class com.nurikabe.controller.Nurikabe
Resets marked grids on the game board and sets number of mistakes to 0.
resetBoard() - Method in class com.nurikabe.model.Board
Unmarks all set grids, and resets mistakes to 0.
resetMistakes() - Method in class com.nurikabe.model.Board

S
